languages.text: {n}Я не могу преcечь нить Плети клинком, ибо серфы заметят во мне ткача и устрашатся. Но многие погибали в плазмапалатах от искры машинных духов. Я использую это. Сеть будет сплетена.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Я не могу преcечь нить души Плети клинком, ибо сервы заметят во мне ткача и возбоятся действовать. Нужно осмотреться. Многие погибали в плазмапалатах от мощи движущей силы. Я использую это. Сеть будет сплетена.{/n}

languages.text: {n}I cannot sever Whip's thread with a blade, for the serfs would recognise me as one of the spinners and lose all courage. But the spark of the machine spirits in the plasma drive chambers has already claimed the lives of many. I will use this, and thus, the web will be spun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Я не могу преcечь нить Плети клинком, ибо серфы заметят во мне ткача и устрашатся. Но многие погибали в плазмапалатах от искры машинных духов. Я использую это. Сеть будет сплетена.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}I cannot sever Whip's thread with a blade, for the serfs would recognise me as one of the spinners and lose all courage. But the spark of the machine spirits in the plasma drive chambers has already claimed the lives of many. I will use this, and thus, the web will be spun.{/n}

{n}I cannot sever Scourge's thread with a knife, for the serfs would recognise me as one of the weavers and become dismayed. But the Motive Force in the plasma drive chambers has claimed the lives of many. I will use it. The net will be spun.{/n}

{n}I cannot sever Scourge's thread with a knife, for the serfs would recognise me as one of the weavers and become dismayed. But the Motive Force in the plasma drive chambers has already claimed the lives of many. I will use it, and thus, the net will be spun.{/n}

{n}I cannot sever Scourge's thread with a knife, for the serfs would recognise me as one of the weavers and become dismayed. But the Motive Force in the plasma drive chambers has already claimed the lives of many. I will use it, and thus, the net will be spun.{/n}

{n}I cannot sever Whip's thread with a blade, for the serfs would recognise me as one of the spinners and lose all courage. But the spark of the machine spirits in the plasma drive chambers has already claimed the lives of many. I will use this, and thus, the web will be spun.{/n}

{n}I cannot sever Whip's thread with a blade, for the serfs would recognise me as one of the spinners and lose all courage. But the spark of the machine spirits in the plasma drive chambers has already claimed the lives of many. I will use this, and thus, the web will be spun.{/n}

{n}I cannot sever Whip's thread with a blade, for the serfs would recognise me as one of the spinners and lose all courage. But the spark of the machine spirits in the plasma drive chambers has already claimed the lives of many. I will use this, and thus, the web will be spun.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ich kann Peitsches Faden nicht mit einer Klinge durchtrennen, denn die Sklaven würden mich als Spinnerin erkennen und sämtlichen Mut verlieren. Doch der Funke des Maschinengeistes in den Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern hat schon viele Leben gefordert. Ich werde ihn nutzen und durch ihn wird das Netz gesponnen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I cannot sever Whip's thread with a blade, for the serfs would recognise me as one of the spinners and lose all courage. But the spark of the machine spirits in the plasma drive chambers has already claimed the lives of many. I will use this, and thus, the web will be spun.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ich kann Peitsches Faden nicht mit einer Klinge durchtrennen, denn die Sklaven würden mich als Spinnerin erkennen und sämtlichen Mut verlieren. Doch der Funke des Maschinengeistes in den Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern hat schon viele Leben gefordert. Ich werde ihn nutzen und durch ihr wird das Netz gesponnen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}No puedo cortar el hilo de Látigo con una daga, pues los siervos me reconocerían como tejedora y perderían todo su coraje. Pero la chispa de los espíritus máquina de las cámaras del motor de plasma ya se ha llevado las vidas de muchos. La usaré para tejer la red.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I cannot sever Whip's thread with a blade, for the serfs would recognise me as one of the spinners and lose all courage. But the spark of the machine spirits in the plasma drive chambers has already claimed the lives of many. I will use this, and thus, the web will be spun.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}No puedo cortar el hilo de Látigo con una daga, pues los siervos me reconocerían como tejedora y perderían todo su coraje. Pero la chispa de los espíritus máquina de las cámaras del motor de plasma ya se ha llevado las vidas de muchos. La usaré para tejer la red.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ウィップの糸を刃で切断することはできない。農奴たちは私が織り手の一人だと認識し、勇気を失うだろう。けれどプラズマ ドライブ室の機械精霊の火花は、すでに多くの命を奪っている。私はこれを使う。そして網は紡がれる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I cannot sever Whip's thread with a blade, for the serfs would recognise me as one of the spinners and lose all courage. But the spark of the machine spirits in the plasma drive chambers has already claimed the lives of many. I will use this, and thus, the web will be spun.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ウィップの糸を刃で切断することはできない。農奴たちは私が織り手の一人だと認識し、勇気を失うだろう。けれどプラズマ ドライブ室の機械精霊の火花は、すでに多くの命を奪っている。私はこれを使う。そして網は紡がれる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}我没办法用利刃切断“皮鞭”的丝线，因为这样一来，那些仆役就会辨认出我织网者的身份，不敢继续生事。不过，等离子驱动室中机魂爆发的火花已经夺去了很多人的性命，我可以利用它来编织我的罗网。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I cannot sever Whip's thread with a blade, for the serfs would recognise me as one of the spinners and lose all courage. But the spark of the machine spirits in the plasma drive chambers has already claimed the lives of many. I will use this, and thus, the web will be spun.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}我没办法用利刃切断“皮鞭”的丝线，因为这样一来，那些仆役就会辨认出我织网者的身份，不敢继续生事。不过，等离子驱动室中机魂爆发的火花已经夺去了很多人的性命，我可以利用它来编织我的罗网。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Je ne peux couper le fil de Fouet avec une lame, car les serfs reconnaîtraient en moi une tisseuse et perdraient tout courage. Mais l'étincelle des esprits de la machine a déjà pris bien des vies dans les salles des réacteurs à plasma. Je vais m'en servir pour tisser la toile.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I cannot sever Whip's thread with a blade, for the serfs would recognise me as one of the spinners and lose all courage. But the spark of the machine spirits in the plasma drive chambers has already claimed the lives of many. I will use this, and thus, the web will be spun.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Je ne peux couper le fil de Fouet avec une lame, car les serfs reconnaîtraient en moi une tisseuse et perdraient tout courage. Mais l'étincelle des esprits de la machine a déjà pris bien des vies dans les salles des réacteurs à plasma. Je vais m'en servir pour tisser la toile.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kamçı'nın ipliğini bıçakla kesemem. Çünkü köleler, dokurlardan biri olduğumu fark edip tüm cesaretlerini yitirir. Fakat plazma iticisi odalarındaki makine ruhlarının kıvılcımı, hâlihazırda nice canlar aldı. Bunu kullanacağım ve böylece ağ örülecek.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I cannot sever Whip's thread with a blade, for the serfs would recognise me as one of the spinners and lose all courage. But the spark of the machine spirits in the plasma drive chambers has already claimed the lives of many. I will use this, and thus, the web will be spun.{/n}
